ReleaseNotes:

Fans of the Moody Blues hungry for the band's intoxicatingly rich arrangements and
soaring melodies need look no further than this terrific compilation. What it lacks in depth this collection makes up for in breadth, spanning the band's 30-year history of hits from "Tuesday Afternoon (Forever Afternoon)" to "Your Wildest Dreams." Featuring some of Justin Hayward and John Lodge's best songwriting and packed with performances
truly worthy of the superlative adjective greatest, this collection of hits delivers the goods. --L.A. Smith

Note: This is an original recording reiusse/remaster!
